    • incrementPlayerLevel

      public String incrementPlayerLevel(int playerPosition, int levelPosition, int score)
      Description if the player could not pass to the desired level, this method indicates how many points are needed to achieve it.
      Parameters:
      playerPosition - int position in the player's arrangement
      levelPosition - int position of a level in the array
      score - int player's score
      Returns:
      msg String message indicating whether or not the player has passed a level, in case he/she is not able to climb to that level, the message will include the points that are missing to pass the level.
